title: Consider the Audience
text: Storytelling in data presentation helps the audience connect with the information.

title: Engagement Factor
text: Using stories can make the data more engaging and easier to understand.

title: Memory Aid
text: Stories can help the audience remember the data better.

title: Relatability
text: Storytelling makes data relatable by connecting it to real-life scenarios.

hintAnswer: It helps to make data more relatable and memorable.
title: Choose the Best Option
text: Select the option that highlights the benefit of storytelling in data presentation.
choices: It helps to make data more relatable and memorable.
It allows the presenter to use more technical jargon.
It ensures the presentation is longer.
It focuses solely on numerical accuracy.
